trans-unit.source: Provides the transition to a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> in a state machine workflow.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a transição para um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> num fluxo de trabalho de máquina de estado.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The SetStateActivity can be used only in state machine workflows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]O SetStateActivity pode ser utilizada apenas em fluxos de trabalho de máquina de estado.

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity provides transitions only to leaf <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities (a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> that does not contain other <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> activities).
trans-unit.target: O SetStateActivity fornece transições apenas a folha <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>atividades (um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>que não contenham outros <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>atividades).</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity only provides transitions between two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> classes and does not support <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> to parent <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> transitions or any other combination.
trans-unit.target: O SetStateActivity fornece apenas transições entre duas <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>classes e não suporta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>principal <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>transições ou qualquer combinação de outra.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>

trans-unit.source: The SetStateActivity has to be a leaf node within the activity tree of an event handler.
trans-unit.target: O SetStateActivity tem de ser um nó de folha dentro da árvore da atividade de um processador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: There can be more than one SetStateActivity but all the activities must be leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: Pode existir mais do que um SetStateActivity mas todas as atividades têm de ser nós de folha.

trans-unit.source: SetStateActivity is always the last activity in the run path of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: SetStateActivity é sempre a última atividade no caminho de execução de um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>atividade.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity"> </xref> classe com o nome da atividade.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: O nome definido pelo utilizador da atividade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the target state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do Estado de destino.

trans-unit.source: The name of the target stream.
trans-unit.target: O nome do fluxo de destino.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SetStateActivity.TargetStateName*> property.
